0.description: Scheduled - Trigger for Propels to run on a specific schedule.

cron.description: Specify a schedule using the UNIX cron format to trigger the Propel (the Propel won't run until the cron triggers for the first time).

interval_in_min.description: If Schedule is not specified, choose an interval in minutes to trigger the Propel periodically, starting immediately. Use -1 as a special value to trigger the Propel only once. It will trigger again every time the Propel is updated.

2.description: Make a call to a REST API

ignore_errors.description: If Yes, this node will succeed regardless of the API response

integration_id.description: Pick a satellite integration to make the call from. If not specified, only public APIs can be reached.

content_type.description: Content type of the body (for example: "application/json")
